#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
long long int a[10000+1];
int main()
{
	a[0]=0;
	a[1]=9;
	a[2]=90;
	a[3]=900;
	
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(n<=3)
		{
	     printf("%lld\n",a[n]);
	 	}
	 	else
	 	{
	 		int i;
	 		for(i=4;i<=n;i++)
	 		{
	 			if(a[i]!=0)
	 			continue;
	 			a[i]=(((a[i-2]*9)%MOD+(a[i-3]*9)%MOD)%MOD+(a[i-1]*9)%MOD)%MOD;
	 			//a[i]%=MOD;
	 			//if(a[i]<0)
	 			//a[i]=MOD+a[i];
	 		}
	 		printf("%lld\n",a[n]);
	 	}
	}
	return 0;
}
